15.47: makq-Daa-laa muvq Eei maa-li-yaa Zauj yo-setg Eei maa, maa-li-yaa, mavg Jyenq yo-sepq zavj ye-su Eei sei yem haaij.
15.10: pi-laatq hiuq tu'q sai myenb pyeiq mweig Jia'q ye-su Zivj taaib zx'q Jiu pun ninb.
15.25: zx'q ye-su tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj uaq zang se luvb Dxm Duab nxm zyavb hog.
15.22: ninb Bua txb ye-su mivb Tauj nxm txvj, Buaj heug kon-ko-Taa. eij leid se mGxvb Kx'q txvj.
15.28: Navq naaig, kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, “ninb zu'g Zauj zwib myenb tivg zwid,” uaq Jruj waag za'kevb Zwrtq taaib zyen Eei.
15.29: Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb Ki ninb, Wavj Jyenq mGxvq kxvq, “aaq, meib xij Zc'q zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq. Ga'haaq pua Nxi cvj kanb Zeij Jiad taaib ni!
15.30: Fruj meib kanb a'q. Fiag zyepg Ravg Jaaj taaib maa'b!”

11.18: sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv haid liud naaiq teij sig, ninb Bua zyrug Namq xij taaq haiq tiug za'eij haib taij ye-su, yrug haid kamb Riaj ninb, weig zu'g zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb ninb Faauj Eei waag.
11.8: myenb Zamq Eei lovg kanb Eei tomb lwi timg uaq Jauq. maaib teij yaag mivb Deig kc'q Dyavb nxmb yetg txq yetg txq Eei, timg Jyenq Jauq.
11.33: ninb Bua zyrug tau ye-su, “yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q.” ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “Navq naaig, yia yaag maiq Buaj meib Bua yia maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig.”
11.3: sij kxvq haiq taub naaig meib Bua, ‘meib Bua fuvg Navq naaiq nx zruj?’ xij zu'g tau ninb, ‘zyruq Qyemj zu'g lovg. aaq tavb zyrug fuvj Rwrnj a'q.’+”
11.32: mq paag, sij kxvq Bua kxvq, ‘myenb pun taaib,’+” (ninb Bua kamb Riaj zwavj myenb weig zu'g zwavj myenb funj tivg yo-han se za'kevb penj taub trug waag myenb.)
11.21: pi-te Javj zu'g ye-su Eei waag zyrug Buaj ninb, “saib tiaj aa'b! mavg kaaj! meib hruq naaiq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj ib zang Kru Gaai Revg mig a'q!”
11.14: ye-su Buaj uaq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj, “yavb naaiq Jiaj, maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q Eang meib Eei pyruq a'q.” ye-su kxvq naaiq Jruj waag, ninb Eei saib kxj Bua yaag haid Eei.
11.23: yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, haiq taub Buaj naaiq nxm Bov, ‘swiq Zwrtq, Fiag Kxiq maa'b!’ uaq taub Eei Hruq yaag maiq Buvb Byenq, za'kevb syenj xij Zwrtq taaib ei ninb kxvq Eei waag nx, zyrug za'kevb xij Zwrtq taaib Navq uaq nx.
11.6: ninb Bua zyrug ei ye-su Eei waag tau. uaq teij myenb zyrug pun ninb Bua Ken Jyenq mivb a'q.
11.2: Buaj zyavj ninb Bua, “xij zu'g mivb Ra'Myen mcvj uaq nxm laavd. yetq pia'g laavd zyrug pwatg taub maa-li txn, myenb maiq kcvb keb Jiaj, Dob Jyenq uaq. xij zu'g Jaiq Ken taaib naaiq.
11.20: ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei, ye-su Zauj saib kxj Bua Jiaj Jauq pwatg uaq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj Gaai Tauj ka'Diaq kxn, taig mig a'q.
11.24: weig naaiq, yia Buaj meib Bua, meib Bua tauj kauj Toq haiq Euvg, xij zu'g syenj meib Bua tu'q uaq Euvg, zyrug za'kevb tu'q a'q.
11.28: naaig ninb, “meib maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig? naaiq Euvg leid haiq taub pun meib?”
11.7: Ken Tauj ye-su uaq, ninb Bua zyrug zx'q ninb Bua Eei tomb lwi timg Jyenq maa-li Eei ti'g taand. ye-su zyrug keb Jyenq a'q.
11.29: ye-su tau ninb Bua, “yia mq paag xij naaig Jruj waag meib Bua. meib Bua tau yia nx, yia zyrug Buaj meib Bua yia maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig.
11.19: luvb maanb Mwavj teij, ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Zwrtq zivb mig a'q.
11.17: ye-su Faauj zwavj myenb, “kivb sru fiaq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei waag kxvq, ‘yia Eei pyauq, myenb xij heug zruj tauj kauj Eei pyauq, weig pun maang fivj mivb uaq tauj kauj.’ mq paag meib Bua lovg zruj ‘Janb za'g pivj Eei Kwrtq.’+”
11.31: ninb Bua zyrug laanb Zauj laanb Zaavb laavb, “Bua hxpg zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq? sij kxvq Bua kxvq, ‘Tinb huvb pun taaib,’ ninb xij kxvq, ‘uaq Euvg, meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq syenj yo-han?’
11.30: tau yia og. haiq taub pun yo-han maaib leid Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid, Tinb huvb fai paamb myenb?”
11.27: ye-su Bua cvj Rwrnj Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. ye-su yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei laatg ka'Euad yavb Jauq uaq zang, sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv, cvj Zauj myenb koj taaib
11.11: ye-su Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem yaag pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq mavg Revg Euvb Euvg. mq paag luvb aaq lamb teij Mwavj a'q. ninb cvj Zauj ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj zyrug Zwrtq zivb mivb Be-Taa-ni laavd.
11.5: saib kxj Bua Jaiq uaq zang, sruq ka'Len Eei myenb naaig, “meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg Jaiq maa-li txn?”
11.9: mivb Daavg uaq teij, Zauj Ga'haaq kan Jyenq mivb uaq teij, lomb Rxib heug, “ho-saa-naa! Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q tevq zyruq Eei Buaj taaib uaq taub.
11.16: ninb yaag maiq pun haiq taub pyenb haiq Euvg yavb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei laatg ka'Euad Jiaj.
11.4: ninb Bua zyrug mivb, yaag pwatg taub maa-li txn Dob Jyenq kcvb Daavg, yem uaq Jaub Len.
11.10: Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q pun meib xij lyepg Eei kua'q, se Bua Eei ovb Taaij, Daa-witq huvb, Eei kua'q. ho-saa-naa! Zev yem Lav Jiaj uaq taub Tinb huvb.”
11.22: ye-su tau ninb Bua, “xij zu'g syenj Kauj Tinb huvb.
11.12: ta'Eeig Dxm, ye-su Bua Zwrtq Be-Taa-ni laavd uaq zang, ye-su Hruq sia.
11.15: mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, ye-su pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zyrug zung maaid maaig uaq teij myenb Zwrtq mivb. ninb puvj Kiv Tiuq Eaanb uaq teij myenb Eei tiab Zauj maaig pc'g kopq uaq teij myenb Eei tavj.
11.13: ninb pwatg maaib zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj yem ko teij Eei, maaib nxmb Eyemd Eei. ninb zyrug mivb Tauj Dyavb kxn mavg kaaj, maaib pyruq fai maiq maaib. mq paag Kuvj pwatg nxmb Navq, maiq maaib pyruq, weig zu'g maiq kcvb Tauj zyavb pyruq Eei zyavb hog.
11.1: ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Tauj fatq teij ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, yem ka'lanq Bov, nitq Betg-faa-yi Zauj Be-Taa-ni laavd. ye-su zyrug Paaiq i taub ninb Eei saib kxj mivb Daavg,
11.26: sij kxvq myenb zruj txvg meib Bua, meib Bua yaag maiq kwavg, meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj fib Navq Eei maiq kwavg meib Bua zruj Eei zwid.”
11.25: meib Bua sruq Jyenq tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog, sij kxvq meib Javj zu'g maaib haiq taub zruj txvg meib, xij zu'g kwavg pun ninb, meib Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Zivj taaib kwavg meib zruj txvg Eei zwid.

1.18: ninb Bua lyemb zeib kwavg ninb Bua Eei muvd, kan Jyenq ye-su mivb a'q.
1.45: mq paag uaq taub myenb mivb Tauj haaij, Qa'q kxvq naaiq teij Jaub lrug. ninb kxvq Zamq haig, ye-su Zivj taaib maiq haib txv zwavj pia'g haiq nxm muvq. ninb xij zu'g yem zivb ka'Eiag levb Eei txvj, mq paag Zxg maaib faamb puv feij lrug Eei myenb taaib lxd ninb.
1.3: “maaib laanb myenb yem teib puvb Waav heug Jyenq kxvq, ‘xij zu'g liug leid zyruq Eei Jauq. ninb Eei Jauq xij zu'g Kxi za'g Eei.’+”
1.43: ye-su Jaa waag Niaq Eei, heug ninb Rwrnj a'q.
1.14: yo-han zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob, Ga'haaq ye-su mivb kaa-li-li scvq zunb Tinb huvb Eei Kuq fyenj.
1.34: ye-su zyrug zxg lovj myenb Zamq Eei Euvb Euvg pcvg, yaag zung Zwrtq Zamb taub myenq. ninb yaag maiq pun myenq kxvq haiq Euvg weig zu'g myenq hiuq tu'q ninb tovb haiq taub.
1.2: trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, fiaq Jyenq, “Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia xij Paaiq yia Eei trug fyenj myenb mivb Daavg liug leid meib Eei Jauq.’+”
1.36: si-mon Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei txig Zwrtq mivb lxd.
1.35: ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei, luvb zuvq maiq kcvb Fav, ye-su Jiad sin Zwrtq mivb levb Eei txvj, yem uaq tauj kauj.
1.24: “naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su aa'b! meib maaib haiq Euvg kwen zu'g yia Bua? meib taaib naaiq xij myetg Revg yia Bua? meib haiq taub yia hiuq Eei. meib se Tinb huvb Eei uaq taub Zivb Revg myenb.”
1.7: ninb zunb Buaj myenb, “yia taaib Daavg, maaib taub Ga'haaq taaib. uaq taub kaub Lo yia. yia lyemb maiq Pwij Do'q Fiag Tevj ninb Jaiq heb Laav.
1.17: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua taaib kan yia og. yia xij Faauj meib Bua lxd myenb Navq ib zang meib Bua lxd Byaud nx.”
1.11: maaib Qiaj yem kub vwaaig luvb kxvq, “meib se yia Eei txnb Namq. yia za'kevb a'Neiq haig meib.”
1.33: muvq Eei zwavj myenb taaib kapq zunq uaq kcvb Daavg.
1.16: ye-su yavb Jauq kan Jyenq kaa-li-li Kxib txn Len mivb uaq zang, pwatg i taub zx'q Byaud Eei myenb, si-mon Zauj ninb Eei yrud an-Daa-lu, yem uaq Kxiq pxvd Byaud.
1.40: maaib taub putq komb huq pcvg Eei myenb taaib kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen Toq ninb Tevj. ninb kxvq, “sij kxvq meib xij nx, meib haib zxg lovj yia Eei pcvg.”
1.37: lxd pwatg, ninb Bua kxvq, “zwavj myenb haiq taub yaag lxd meib.”
1.4: yo-han taaib yem teib puvb Waav Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid yaag zunb tod kxvq, “xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid, Jiaj uam Eei leid, Tinb huvb zyrug kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid.”
1.12: sivj livb lyemb zeib Paaiq ye-su mivb uaq teib puvb Waav.
1.13: ninb zyrug yem uaq feij zyepg Nxi zu'g saa-taan seij. ninb Zauj Yiab zxib yem uaq, yaag maaib finb myenb taaib liug leid ninb.
1.26: uaq taub Yiab kwaiq myenq pun uaq taub myenb Datg Datg Eei Zyru, vaaub vaauq Eei heug Jyenq Zwrtq mig a'q.
1.28: ye-su Eei mevb taub zyrug syepg syepq Eei siv kxmj kaa-li-li scvq.
1.8: yia lovg uam Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid, mq paag ninb xij lovg sivj livb Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid.”
1.9: txij uaq teij Nxib Eia'g, ye-su yem kaa-li-li scvq Eei naa-saa-letq muvq mivb yo-han uaq. yo-han zyrug yem uaq Jx-Dcn Daaib Tevj ninb Jiaj uam Eei leid.
1.32: tovb naaig Nxi Ba'Nxi mwrtq, Ryemb yaavb Eei zyavb hog, myenb txb yetg zuvq putq pcvg Zauj zu'g myenq mua'q Eei myenb mivb ye-su uaq.
1.21: ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj mivb Tauj Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq. Tauj tivb kov Nxi, ye-su mivb uaq wig txvb Faauj myenb.
1.23: uaq zang, lyemb zeib maaib taub zu'g Yiab kwaiq myenq mua'q Eei myenb  pia'g ninb Bua Eei wig txvb naub naug Eei kxvq,
1.6: yo-han zu'q Eei lwib hruj lovg lxb Txb pyei Datq taaib, yaag lovg Dopg Laav sai Jyenq Jaaiq. ninb Eang Eei ka'naaiq se Jopg Eeig Zauj lomg Eei mweib txvb.
1.44: ninb kxvq, “naaiq teij sig Zinb maang maiq tuvq Buaj haiq taub og. pcv za'g Eei mivb sai myenb uaq pun ninb zaab mavg. mavg liud, xij zu'g ei mo-se fiaq Eei leid txb scvb Kuq mivb ziag pun Tinb huvb weig saaj meib Eei wij, zruj zxvb zevj pun zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q meib Eei pcvg lovj Revg.”
